events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under 'Refund' due to the customer's request for money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item delivered.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I'll be happy to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the problem?
Here is my order number 123456789 and attached is a photo showing the item I received, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and send you a return label for the incorrect item.
Thank you for the quick response and the solution. I appreciate the refund and will send the item back promptly.
The refund has been processed and a return label was emailed to you. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are following up to ensure you received your refund and that the return process was smooth. Please reach out if there are any issues.
As there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
